grinliz::Quad2F

grinliz::Quad2F< X0, X1 > Struct Template Reference

Create a mini vertex array for a quad. More...

#include <glgeometry.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<int X0, int X1>
struct grinliz::Quad2F< X0, X1 >

Create a mini vertex array for a quad.

  • The X0 term is the pattern: 0, 1, 1, 0
  • The X1 term is the pattern: 0, 0, 1, 1
